resources.string: Welcome to Race Yourself\nAre you ready to run?
This is your home screen\nwhere most of the action happens

RaceYourself is all about
 planning 'races' to make sure you
 get off the couch and to make
 it more fun to push yourself
It\'s the ultimate way to stay\n motivated + have fun running

Whether it's a friend,
 someone from the community
 a zombie or your PB - you have to
 race VERSUS something!
When you\'re ready,\n hit run to start your race.

The store. After your first run
 you will earn some coins. At the store
 you can spend your hard-earn bounty
 on features and upgrades.
As it\'s your first race, you may want to try Automatch. It will find someone from the community of similar skill to run with.
